### What to do for Week 4 after class ends^[For grading.]

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("square", fill = "steelblue"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-square", fill = "steelblue"))

wk_post <- tibble(
"eCampus?" = c(checked,
               unchecked, 
               checked),

Description = c("Submit the first quiz.^[Note: Due this Friday]",
  "Complete a module in Data Camp focused on basic descriptive statistics and an introduction to probability.",
               "Complete problems 1, 2, 3, 7, 8, 12, and 13 in Chapter 4."),

Location = c("[Link](/lesson/04-lesson/#data-camp-1)", 
             "[Link](/assignment/04-homeworks/#weekly-task-1)",
             "[Link](https://ecampus.wvu.edu/){target='_blank'}")

)
```

